bibl.idno: The Philip S. Hench Walter Reed/Yellow Fever Collection [manuscript] / [collected by] Philip S. Hench ; HEALTHSCI MS-1.

bibl.title: Letter from [Howard A. Kelly] to W.W. Norman, November 6, 1922

div1.p: [Kelly] agrees to Norman's suggested changes to the new edition of “Walter Reed and Yellow Fever.“

div1.head: Letter from [Howard A. Kelly] to W.W. Norman, November 6, 1922
div1.p:
The memorandum you sent me is perfectly
satisfactory and seems in every way just and equitable.
I do not want to push off on you more than you
anticipated undertaking when we talked the matter
over and shall, therefore, leave it to you to decide
for what I am to be responsible in making the larger
changes you mention, - those not compassed by an ex-
cision from the plate. Please go ahead at once with
the work.
